name: Mine Hazard Rover
description:
--PRESS SPACE TO USE RADAR - MOVE BY TOUCHING THE SCREEN--

The goal:

Reach the goal by filling the "Area Safety"- meter to top. You are closer to the success while you locate the new areas. Green color means the terrain is revealed.

Movement & The Game Play:

- Touch the robot's perimeter to rotate the robot around.

- Move the robot by touching the terrain - Be careful not to run over the mine - the mines are hidden! Revealed - but still dangerous - mines being marked automatically with the flags.

- Click metal detector button to reveal rover's front area: metal detector will tell you, if you have scanned a mine in the scanned. Green areas are free from hazards. Purple area tells you there may be a risk to entering the area. You lose rover energy while you do the scanning. Stepping on the mines you rover lose health.

----------

Instructions:

"Welcome to the thrill of this puzzle game, where the sensitivity to explosions is always on one step away forward. 

Your task is to locate explosive mines with a robot rover.  The mines are hidden inside the earth's crust. Using a metal detector, your job is to locate the mines inside the earth's crust. 

The field is completed when there is sufficient mapped safe clearing space in the whole game area and then the area is safe to start de-mining work."

----------

The game is made for the Pocket Game Jam #6. Project is made by 3 Finnish people just in 2 days.
